questions.question1: What is PLATA and how does your digital wallet work?
questions.answer1: PLATA is a digital wallet (open wallet) available for Android and iOS that allows you to securely store your personal credentials, as well as your credit and debit cards. With PLATA, you can enable the contactless functionality to use your work ID or make payments directly from your phone at compatible establishments.
questions.question2: Where can I download the app?
questions.answer2: PLATA is available on Google Play and the App Store. Just search for 'PLATA' and download it for free.
questions.question3: What type of documents can I store in the app?
questions.answer3: You can store IDs, contracts, insurance policies, invoices, tickets, and other important documents.
questions.answer4: Yes. PLATA uses advanced security technology to protect your information and transactions.
questions.question5: What payment methods does PLATA accept?
questions.answer5: You can link credit cards, debit cards, bank accounts, or even cryptocurrencies.
questions.question6: Where can I use PLATA as a payment method?
questions.answer6: PLATA is accepted at large companies, stores, businesses, and ventures affiliated with our national network.
questions.question7: What if I have problems with the app?
questions.answer7: If you need help, you can easily contact us through our contact page. We're here to help!
questions.question8: What do I need to open my PLATA account?
questions.answer8: To set up your account, you just need to fill out a short form with your personal information: name, date of birth, ID number, email address or phone number. In less than 30 seconds, your virtual wallet will be ready to use.
questions.question9: How can I verify the validity of the documents?
questions.answer9: When you enter your credential or card information, you can easily activate the contactless function, as long as the information is correct and verified by PLATA's servers.

about.body: At PLATA, we believe in a future where technology simplifies people's financial lives. We are a company focused on developing secure, accessible, and efficient digital solutions. Our main tool is the PLATA app, a digital wallet that lets you make payments, store important documents, and manage credentials from your phone. We created PLATA with the goal of offering a modern, practical, and reliable experience designed to support you daily, wherever you are.
about.mission_body: Provide a simple, secure, and accessible digital solution to manage credentials, cards, and payments, promoting financial inclusion through technology focused on user experience.
about.vision_body: Transform the concept of digital wallets by becoming the leading platform in solving local financial problems with innovative, accessible solutions tailored to each community.

values.values1: Innovation: We constantly seek to improve and offer modern solutions.
values.values2: Security: We protect our users' information and transactions.
values.values3: Accessibility: We create tools that are easy to use and available to everyone.
values.values4: Trust: We build long-term relationships with our users through transparency and great service.
